summary: Passenger air travel provides a vital connection between small communities and the wider world and is an important driver of an area's economic growth. However, some smaller commercial airports described challenges in getting airlines to provide service or in keeping flights they already have. The Department of Transportation does offer grants to eligible small communities to help jumpstart new airline service at their airports. But...
title: Commercial Aviation: Certain Nonhub Airports Face Significant Challenges in Securing and Maintaining Air Service
